column4: i have a simple fstab Q: i have a partition that i'd like to mount at a certain folder (/mnt/vbox), but i can't get the fstab line to do what i want it to ... it keeps putting icons on the desktop, even when i have "noauto" ... here's what the line is now: "UUID=ff9b6a4d-2d71-4feb-ac6e-adaecc87ce36 /mnt/vbox ext3 noauto,user,noexec,rw 0 1" ... thank you in advance
